channel.title: Vue.js Starter Project :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: This set of milestones is all about building a RESTful API and interface for the Lost Kansas Communities project. Milestone 5 - Vue Starter Project Follow the instructions in the Example Project to build a project using Vue.js that includes the following features: A single page frontend application running in Vue 3. Built-in Vue features such as Vue Router and Pinia. Access to components and icons from PrimeVue. Access to Tailwind CSS for additional CSS styling and features.
